page.title: 14THE ROYAL HOTEL
page.content:
The man that owned the Royal Hotel said that he had been working there for eight years. His name is Eric Johnson. He said that he would like to move but not just yet He said that he gets hundreds of people staying there in one week. When we went there he said that he had six bedrooms to let. When we knocked on the door an old lady answered.She said they had three cleaners working there and quite a few other staff but Eric could not say how many.The pub had a restaurant joined on,and some tables and some swings out side.
CAROL HARRISON
